sentences.sContent: Slowed only slightly, I continued my rapid ascent, not stopping until the fingers of my right hand were two knuckles deep into the pulley.
sentences.sContent_eng: Slowed only slightly, I continued my rapid ascent, not stopping until the fingers of my right hand were two knuckles deep into the pulley.
sentences.sCn: 只减慢了一点点速度，我还是继续快速上升，直到我的右手手指卷进滑轮两指节深才停下来。

trans.tranOther: a piece of equipment consisting of a wheel over which a rope or chain is pulled to lift heavy things
